name: X-Easync
short_description:
Multi-platform/multi-language program that easily
synchronize local and remote directories.
Based in rsync, it allows to do incr.backup, mirroring,
web upload, team work, etc.
It send by e-mail generated public keys.
Command line and GUI available.
